scripts.test.android: yarn && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: yarn && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-webgl && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: yarn && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: yarn && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.ios: yarn && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android: yarn && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && rimraf platforms && cd ../demo-angular && rimraf platforms
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-webgl && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../demo-angular && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
